about.title: About This App
about.description: A collection of fun learning games for young children. Learn about animals, colors, shapes, numbers and more in an engaging way.

aboutSite.title: About This Site
aboutSite.description1: "Let's Play Together!" is a platform that brings together educational mini-games for young children. We support your child's growth through fun and engaging learning games.
aboutSite.description2: All games have safe and educational content, designed for parents and children to enjoy together.

targetAge.title: Target Age
targetAge.description: Primarily designed for children aged 3 to 8, but game difficulty varies. Each game displays a recommended age, so please choose games appropriate for your child.
